summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 36E, page 103, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in J. H. Nagle's 1st Addition, Lots 7 to 11 incl., Block 37, and Lots 2 to 6 incl., Block 38, located on boths sides of 12th Ave. No. from 60 ft. north of East Howell to Denny Way, as Community Business (BC) Zone.
